jGame.main

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • jGame.main.Game

  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    The main object to control whole game.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Game.Builder
      the thing to create game object, please read the docs of every method *must contain args : output, render, update

      • addObject

        public void addObject(GameObject gameObject,
                      int priority)
               throws PriorityException
        add an object to the list, start rendering and updating.
        Parameters:
        gameObject - the object which is going to be added
        Throws:
        PriorityException - if the priority is not between 0 and 9, it will throw an exception.

      • addTimer

        public void addTimer(Timer timer,
                     int priority)
              throws PriorityException
        add a timer to the thread
        Parameters:
        timer - the timer which is going to be added
        priority - the update priority, it will be updated quicker if it smaller. (This should be smaller than the total of the threads)
        Throws:
        PriorityException - if the priority is not between 0 and 9, it will throw an exception.

      • removeTimer

        public void removeTimer(Timer timer,
